attributes.action: intercede on behalf of Iranian citizens Maryam Rustampoor and Marzieh Amirizadeh who have been detained in an Iranian prison for over 6 months simply on the basis of their conversion to Christianity and who are suffering great privation and ill health.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Such flagrant abuse of international human rights requires international action. A similiar petition is already going before the US Senate through World Net Daily.

rejection.details: We can not accept petitions about individual legal cases.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
